sentence: The mixed metal salt solution was then added to ethanol (100 mL) containing oxalic acid (90 mmol).
The mixed metal salt solution was then added to ethanol (100 mL) containing oxalic acid (90 mmol).
The mixing produced a yellow-colored suspension, which was allowed to stand for 1 h.
The obtained precursor powder was dried at 120 degC for 2 h and then calcined at 700 degC for 2 h.
An aqueous malic acid solution (50 mL) was added to a solution (50 mL) containing the corresponding metal nitrates or acetates in a stoichiometric ratio under vigorous stirring.
